content: Through the first nine months of 2022, we have received orders exceeding $15.5 million for our CVD systems and services segment as compared to approximately $8.3 million for the same period 2021. Net income for the third quarter was $63,538 or $0.01 per basic and diluted share, this compares to net income of $6 million for year or $0.89 per basic and diluted share in the third quarter of 2021. However, keep in mind that the 2021 quarter included a $6.9 million nonoperating gain on the sale of one of our buildings. This improvement in operating results from the prior year quarter was an increase related -- increased revenue of $3.8 million, and this resulted in increased gross profit of $1.6 million. For the nine months ended September 30, 2022, our revenue was $18.6 million as compared to $11.7 million for the same period in 2021. The net loss for the nine months ended September 30, 2022, was $1.8 million or $0.26 per basic and diluted share. However, you should note that in the nine months ended September 30, 2021, it included two nonoperating gains that totaled $9.3 million. For the nine months ended September 30, 2022, our operating loss decreased by $2 million to $1.6 million as compared to the operating loss that we had in the same period in 2021. Our backlog at September 30, 2022, was $15.7 million as compared to $10.4 million at the beginning of the year as of December 31, 2021.
